content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9 p.M. i went into our breezeway to lock the sliding glass door.  i looked out in a south-southeast direction and saw a bright orange light.  i thought it was saturn, but wasn���t sure because i thought saturn wasn���t visible right now.  i stood there watching it for a few minutes and called to my son to come check out this star.  he came to the window and watched it with me.  it was completely still, not moving, motionless, etc. for a few minutes.  as we watched, it started to slowly move directly up ��� not north, south, etc., but literally up.  i asked him what he was seeing and he said that it was starting to move up.  we watched it for the next few minutes.  it slowly rose, and as it rose the orange began to twinkle.  though it was moving up, i was still thinking it was an aircraft taking off and that the twinkle was due to a parallax from thermals and the high winds we were experiencing last night.  

we continued to watch it for a few minutes.  the upward motion was, at first, slow and gradual then it accelerated and as it accelerated so did the twinkling of the light.  the intensity of the light progressively dimmed by about 50% and then, instead of continuing to fade as it had, it spontaneously sped up and disappeared completely.  my son and i just looked at each other.  i asked him what he saw and he recited the same thing that i had seen.  being 8 years old, he got very scared.  i told him everything would be fine and that if there were ���aliens��� out there, i���m sure there not here to hurt us.  he went to his bedroom to try and fall asleep and i went into the living room to try and understand what it was i saw.  

it is more than possible that this was just an aircraft taking off and that a parallax due to wind and thermals gave it the appearance of ���disappearing��� but i���m only half convinced of that theory.  honestly, i don���t know what i���ve seen on either of these occasions but i know it wasn���t usual.

i���m not sure what to do with this information, short of letting you know about it.  if you want to speak with me about it, please feel free to do so.  i do believe in life on other planets but cannot prove or disprove the possibility of them coming here to visit/observe us or having the intelligence to do so.   however, i���m open to any possibility.  this is the second time that i saw something that can't be explained and this time there is a witness, so i know that "something" was out there.
content.summary: Orange star - began moving - light dissipated to 50% then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: There is something going on here in central/north/east texas and we would really like someone to tell us if it is military or not. the only reason i say that it could be military is that there have been 5 sightings for us beginning on oct. 20th 2008 through dec. 7th ( i reported two of them in october but the one last night was the most interesting of all). last night we had just arrived back to the ranch from dallas and went out on our back porch to feed our dogs at 8:19 pm. a large red orb was hovering on the horizon (less than 20 degrees from ground). it is not the first time we have seen it so we have gotten in the habit of watching it. it appeared to be between the next ranch over and i-45 but we cannot be sure. it always ends up descending or we lose sight of it over the horizon (not sure). we see lots of air traffic following i-45 so we know that this is different. it is larger looking than regular aircraft and does not have flashing lights. we were watching it last night and as it started to fade or descend another very bright marble size object appeared to the upper left of it (no more than 25 degrees above horizon). this object was very bright and was pulsating very fast with many different colors. it was so different that my boyfriend ran in to get his rifle so we could watch it through the scope. i did not feel comfortable by myself outside so i came in but watched it through the doorway. it was much bigger than any aircraft or light and the colors were rapidly changing ( hard to distinguish what exact colors ). my boyfriend looked at it through the scope and could not make out any shape but the lights were so bright it was hard to tell. as he passed the rifle to me to have a look, the light just went out - like someone had turned off a lightbulb. we knew it was still there, it just went black! we were waiting for something to happen and sure enough several piercing white strobe looking lights came on in a triangular formation, they started tumbling across the sky heading north. it looked like three distinct separate lights but in formation, there was quite a bit of distance between the triangle (at least the length of a football field), it almost looked like the lights were communicating with each other and making a cartwheel type motion. this went on until exactly 8:40 when other air traffic entered this things airspace and it just seemed to vanish. we were left just looking at an airplane traveling north along i-45. he had called his mom who lives in town at about 8:35 and she went outside but her view was obstructed by trees etc. we want to know if more sightings like this have been reported. i do want to add that there are two coal & lignite mines near us and our sightings always seem to be close to the lignite mine. we also have a large area near us that is blacked out on google satellite maps and wonder if it is a military area (there are no bases or anything visible). if someone else has seen this in the fairfield, freestone county area, please report it!! we cannot be the only ones witnessing this. i have a few pictures from one previous sighting but i do not have good equipment and it just looks like specs.
content.summary: Continued sightings of very strange lights & objects about 120 miles east of stephenville, tx.

content.detailedDescription:
My name's mary and i've lived in bensalem, pa for the last 36 years.  i've had some "sightings" over the years but i could attribute most to aircraft from the willow grove afb or other local airports.  
 
however, in 1998 i had an experience that i - to this day - cannot explain.  
 
i was in my living room, watching tv around 9 p.M.  the house was very quiet, short of the tv.  i started to feel a rumble that resembled the same feeling you get from a large woofer speaker with the bass turned up.  nothing in the house was moving, as you might expect from that type of vibration.  i figured it was just a neighbor kid blasting his car stereo or something.  thing is, it went on for about 20 minutes.  i finally got irritated and went outside to see what was going on.    
 
i stepped out the front door and the noise stopped instantly.  our neighborhood is pretty quiet so i just took a quick look, no longer hearing the noise i figured the kid had moved on.  it was a beautiful november evening and all of the leaves were off of the trees.  i stargazed for a few seconds and looked above our house to try and find the big dipper.  i found something quite different.  above my house, maybe a few hundred feet, was a patch of sky the size of a football field which was completely blacked out.  you could see the stars around it but the silhouette itself completely blacked out the background.  there were, what i thought were, running lights around the shape, but there was no rhyme or reason to them ��� varying in intensity and color.  
 
the shape itself looked like a cross between a stealth bomber and the front of the concorde.  it was absolutely massive and absolutely silent.  it was alarming because of the sheer size of the object and the fact that it was moving so incredibly slow across the sky - i thought it was going to crash.  i stood there watching it as it crept along the sky.  instead of crashing, it just glided silently and slowly above my home.  i was dumbstruck.  i watched it track from a west-southwest direction to east-northeast.  once it had moved, what appeared to be, a couple of miles from my home it sped up - quickly.  then it suddenly, literally vanished.  i continued to stand there wondering what the heck had just happened.  i went back into the house and the noise was gone.  ten years later, i'm still trying to come to grips with whatever that thing was.
content.summary: Stealth-like merged with the front (nosecone) of the concorde.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were standing on the front porch smoking a cigarette discussing what we had just watched on television. it was a very clear night outside, no clouds in sight. i noticed a bright flash of light on the side of my car parked in the driveway and realized that it was just a reflection of another object. i looked up into the sky and noticed a bright red/orange teardrop shaped object moving at immense speed. the front of the object seemed to be almost perfectly round, with a tail at the end which may or may not have been flames, maybe caused by the object entering the atmosphere at high speeds? it started out almost directly above me by the time i actually saw the object, and moved very quickly headed in an eastward direction. it was only seconds after i noticed the object directly before it disappeared. i did not see it disappear behind any other object, it just seemed to vanish. i did not/ do not really understand what it is that i saw. i have seen shooting stars before, this was definitely not the case. the brightness of that object far surpassed anything i have ever seen in the sky other than the sun or moon. at first i thought it was a meteor, but after looking at the object and the intensity of light, i am uncertain. my friend was very confused too, almost scared it seemed. he said he did not understand what he saw and didn't really want to talk about it. he did say that he heard a noise and that's what made him look up and notice the object. i did not hear anything, i just saw the bright light reflection on the car and looked up to the sky. he did say he noticed the light and the sound at the same time. i felt a little excited, definitely in awe of what i had just witnessed. the hair on the back of my neck was standing up straight and my body was tingling all over. i do not know if it was a meteor or other common event, but i have definitely never seen anything like this object. i have been researching online for a couple of days to see if anyone else has reported any meteors or other anomalies over the area in the past couple of weeks, and have produced no results. i am submitting this report in hopes of bringing together information to find out what happened in the skies on december 3rd, 2008 above my hometown. i would be happy to take a picture of the location and photoshop in what i saw, if it would help in any way, but i do not have any photographic evidence, as the object was only visible for seconds.
content.summary: Bright teardrop shaped object spotted in augusta, georgia moving at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
This is something i saw about three years ago. it seemed highly unusual to me and i tried to figure out exactly what it was, but did not succeed. i don't know that it was a ufo, but i am reporting it here because it has a lot of similarities to the recent report from 2008-11-13 "facing tooele"

from an elevated point on the east side of the salt lake valley i was smoking a cigarette and looking west. i saw a flash above me in my peripheral vision which caused me to immediately look up. something luminous and blue shot down from directly above me towards the valley. i initially thought that this object would hit the valley and possibly one of the planes i could see in the sky. instead, the object disappeared behind the mountains making me believe that it had hit tooele. i now realize that the object may have been much further away than it appeared, but if so it must have been very large. it drew a perfectly straight luminous blue line down from the sky that would have appeared about the width of my pinky finger held at arms length.

i reported the object to a group that tracks re-entry of space debris, and i was told there was nothing that would have fallen in that area at that time. i recorded the exact time and date, but i have misplaced that information (at least for now).

it may have been a shooting star or a meteorite, but i haven't really found any reported sightings of those things that match what i saw. i found it odd that the 2008-11-13 report was the closest description i've ever found to what i saw, and it seems to have happened at the same angle and at the same place.

seeing this thing was quite a strange surprise. it made me smile.
content.summary: Luminous object flies so fast towards the ground that it appears like a blue line from the sky to behind a mountain range. re: facing tooele.

content.detailedDescription: When i was younger, i went over to a friends house who lived about a mile away from me. we lived in a forested area at the time, which has been turned into a houseing developement. there were about 5 of us who saw this ufo late at night. it was very low to the trees. not near the ground but close to the tree tops. it had a large circular shape, with lights that were kind of in a flash. then it dissapeared very quickly. i could try to get a hold of a few of my friends to testify this. it was a little weird.We were kind of scared, but we waited and stood there for a long time, and it seemed longer but i cannot really remember the exact amount of time it lasted. then we went back to my friends house who lived closer in a hurry.
content.summary: Large size, fast, had luminous lights.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 19:00 est on the evening of sunday, november 17th, 1996 my wife, myself, and two children (ages 1 & 6) witnessed and followed a ufo for approximately 45 minutes, coming within 150 ~ 200 feet on some occasions.  

we were traveling west on state highway 378 in rural clarendon county on that evening.  as we were about to enter into the town of turbeville (yes, this is the real name of the town) i came to a screeching halt in the middle of the highway.  just in front of us, maybe 100' off the ground sat this massive ufo, just hovering over the trees.  my wife screamed at me for slamming on the brakes, and asked what i was thinking.  i pointed at the object, and when she looked up, it was moving to the north just over some buildings.  she told me that the object had to be a sign or something, and i reminded her that we were in a very small town, not the city of atlanta where we had moved from just six months before, and that there were no signs in turbeville.  she then told me to get out of the road before i got us hit.  mind you, there is very little traffic in this area on a sunday night, but i drove another 1/4 of a mile or so, and made my turn off onto burnt branch road (southbound).  within just a minute or so, the object came back into view to our left (west), and seemed to hover slowly above an open field, approximately 150' from our car, which i slowed down to a crawl.  this time, my wife got a very good look at the object, and seemed to be as shocked and fascinated as i was.

the ufo was massive - approximately 300' across and shaped similar to a football lying on its side, but had a deck or something like that about 1/3 of the way up from the bottom of the craft.  it emitted a brilliant white light from the entirety of the craft, but as bright as the object was, it did not illuminate the trees, the ground, or anything else it hovered over or near.   

having had the opportunity to see a grounded blimp up close and in person on a couple of occasions at peachtree dekalb airport in metro atlanta, i realized right away that what i was witnessing (a) was not a blimp or any other type of known non-rigid air ship, and (b) this craft had no visible cockpit, tail, rudders, windows, engines or wings. i would estimate that it was at least 1.5x to 2x the size of the average blimp, and again a bright crystal white light emanated from the entire body of the craft, not just a single point.  additionally, there were no flashing lights anywhere on the craft.

for about the next 45 minutes or so, we followed the craft, which would speed up and dart off, then slow down at will, often times just hovering motionless.  during our chase, we came across other cars that had stopped along the side of the road to watch the object.  finally, we sat on a road that i cannot remember the name of, but approximately 10 ~ 12 miles south of our original sighting point, we watched the craft hover over the road in front of us for about 90 seconds, and then begin coming towards us.  my wife, who was already scared by what we were seeing, began to panic, and my son began crying, so we turned the car around and headed on to our original destination, which was my father���s house in new zion.  we lost sight of the craft shortly thereafter.

before this incident, i was a staunch non-believer, but having an encounter this close up, changed my mind forever.  

after telling family and friends of what we witnessed, most told us we were crazy, but my wife���s mother tell us that the next day she heard a story on abc news that a large and very bright ufo had been spotted that sunday up and down the eastern seaboard.  i have never been able to confirm this report, but did find a fellow employee at my company who saw it as well, but from about 20 miles away.

to this day, i really want to know what i saw, and have even considered hypnosis on a few occasions to see if i can enhance my memory of that night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Had a 45 minute encounter with a ufo on sunday, 11/27/1996 that lasted approximately 45 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving home by myself across i 291 eastbound north of hartford ct. at about 715am coming home from a night part time job when i looked up into the sky and above the horizon and at about 30 deg was a circular slightly bumpy greyish slowly tumbling object with some type of smoke around the object as it moved very slowly horizontally across the sky from left to right. there was no sun, i think the sun was behind some clouds near the horizon but it still was fairly bright out.  it was about the size of a quarter to a half dollar in the sky from my perspective. the outside looked like a grey bumpy rock as it tumbled and moved very slowly horizontally with some  smokish matter coming off the object.
     besides the object itself  which i had never seen the likes of before, was that it was tumbling or rotating very very slowly and hardly moving at all from left to right.  at this speed it should have been falling from the sky.  it was neither moving up or down but just in a horizontal line left to right.  i only saw it for maybe 5-10 secs because i didn't think to pull the car over for a longer look because of my speed ,approx 55mph and my safety on the highway.
     when i got home i told my wife about it and called the airpot tower at bradley field in windsor locks, ct and asked if they had seen anything unusual on their radar around that time and they said they hadn't.  i didn't tell them what i saw . i have never forgot this incident and think about it often.  i only wish i had a camera with me.  i lost sight of the object becuase i was turning on a highway curve away from the view of the object.
     my feelings and reaction was of surprise and question due to the color , the tumbling movement and the smoke like material coming off the object and why it wasn't falling out of the sky due to its slow motion horizontal movement.  i only saw this once but it left a forever impression on my mind. i will send you a sketch if you want, let me know.
content.summary: A rough greyish circular object slowly tumbling  about 30 deg across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my motorcycle to work on the morning of nov. 7, 2008. it was 8:35am. it was such a clear day the sky was crystal blue.  as i passed a farm on saxonburg boulevard, i was looking directly into the sky as i was approaching a curve in the road, thinking about how beautiful the sky was and how i would not have too many days like this to ride my motorcycle.  i saw a stationary, diamond shaped shiny object up in the sky.  i was about to pull over to take a picture but when i came around the curve, i looked up at the sky and the object was gone.  i looked in all directions, there was no object to be found anywhere.  it made me feel quite small, but i felt like i had witnessed something spectacular.  every day i look up into the sky at that exact spot to see if i can see the object again.  unfortunately, my sighting was only about 7 seconds long, i wish that it had been longer and i had seen the shape move.
content.summary: Sighting of object on saxonburg blvd.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the city of fayetteville, ar.  at around 6:35 pm, cdt, dec. 7, 2008, i took my dog outside to pee.  after just a few seconds, i noticed a bright white light at about 20-30 degrees in the west northwest.  it proceeded to move rapidly to almost directly overhead.  as it reached 50-60 degrees high, it appeared to be a tight, small triangle of bright white lights, perhaps as bright as venus - brighter than jupiter (both of which are low in the southwest).  there were no flashing lights, no colored lights, as you would expect from a low-flying jet.  no sound.  the object moved much faster than the sighting i'd had of skylab on november 19, when it moved directly over nw arkansas and was visible.  skylab (with the shuttle attached) took three minutes to go from horizon to horizon.  this object took between 30 and 60 seconds to travel from 20-30 degrees in the wnw, past the meridian, to about 70 degrees in the east southeast, where the moon was.  i would estimate it was moving twice as fast as skylab appeared.  it was approaching the moon, which is a day or two past half full and very bright.  it appeared to change course slightly, jogging toward the south, as it moved overhead.  as it approached the moon, it dimmed, finally becoming a single point of light, then disappeared about 5 degrees from the moon.  it never reappeared.  i watched for several minutes for it to emerge from the moon's light on the path it was on, but nothing.  i waiting for over five minutes, and never saw anything else.

i have been a stargazer for more than 25 years and am very aware of the stars, planets and moon phases on a normal basis.  this object was moving faster than anything i've ever observed.  it did not have any colored lights, which i would expect from a low-flying jet (since it was moving so fast).  i observed the conjunction of the moon, venus and jupiter last week, and am aware of the positions of those planets and their relative brightness.  this object was perhaps as bright as venus, but certainly brighter than jupiter.

any other reports of this object?
content.summary: Bright white light moving rapidly - appeared to be a triangle of three white lights at it approached overhead.

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my dog and noticed a bright star like object on the mountain range probably 12 miles from my house.  it looked bright and pretty low.  i watched it as it flew very slowly over my neighborhood.  i went and got my wife and she came out and watched it with me.  i could not make out any shape details other than "star like sphere".  there were many airplanes flying around as always since they tend to fly around the mountain range where i live.  this was much lower than the planes and had absolutely zero flashing lights on it.  it made no sound.  my wife and i watched pretty much in awe as we have seen something similar before.  once it got probably 10 miles from my house it started to go up very high and eventually disappeared.  very interesting sighting and i'm interested to see if anybody else saw it.
content.summary: Bright ball of light flying low, slowly and silently.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and some friends were hanging out on the tailgates of our trucks. we were sitting just right on the edge of town near the local powerplant.
i had just happened to look up in the sky over town and saw this light grey metalic object coming toward us. it was so low that the only reason i was able to see it was because the street lights in town were casting light on it. as it kept getting closer i could tell that it was enormous and was in the shape of a triangle. i got the attention of my friends and pointed it out to them. my first thoughts is that it must be some kind of blimp or balloon. as it came closer i knew that it wasn't a blimp or balloon, because it didn't have any propellars or flames. now, it is right in front of us and it is passing directly over the powerplant. i don't know why, but i expected sirens or something to go off at the powerplant as it was passing over. i also expected to see a lot of people coming out of the town chasing after it but there were none. i was shocked. as huge as this thing is i just knew it should've been getting everyones attention. now, as it is passing over the powerplant, the lights from the powerplant are casting a lot of light on this thing. now it is very well lit up by all the surrounding lights from town and the powerplant. it is definetly grey metalic, no windows, tubular, triangle, no vents, no propellars, no jets, no exhaust of any kind and no markings of any kind. then to top it all off, it makes no noise whatsoever. it is just slowly floating by overhead. as it is passing, i notice that it is hollow inside the triangle, because i can see the stars through the middle of it. it takes it about 15 minutes to come from out of town and pass over the powerplant. now, we get in our vehicles and start to follow it on the back roads. once it gets entirely out of town and away from any buildings or houses a bright white light comes on at each connecting corner. very bright. now that we are driving beside it and it is over a field do we realize just how big this thing really is. it is easily larger than a football field! each light is shining as bright as what you would see from all of the lights combined from a football stadium. we are just driving along real slow trying to follow it the best we can. the best i can figure, we followed it for about an hour. although i can remember the sighting in every detail this many years later, i can still not remember how it left or where it went. i have an uncle that worked with the new madrid county sheriffs office that saw the same craft approximately 2 weeks later. he contacted all local airports and none picked it up on radar. this craft was not the t.R.3b that our government currently uses. i am prior military and know what craft we have to include the aurora.

i have had other sightings and experiences as well. if you contact me i will gladly share them as well.

thank you and god bless,
reverend james collier
content.summary: Observed and followed triangle craft for an hour.

content.detailedDescription: 12 & 10 year kids were in back yard sled riding and object caught their eyes moving from north east to north west of us. they ran to the door screaming, i thought they were bleeding or something, they wanted me to see it, but it was out of sight (there are trees in way of where it traveled).  had them both draw pictures (attached).  it was red, cigar shaped, with light on top in center, and another light that seemed to be floating above it.  it had a row of brighter red small lights down the center also.  there was no sound before or after.  it was moving pretty fast high in the sky (faster than a plane at high altitude) and was about 4 inches long measured at arms length (kids arms).  this is 4th ufo sighting in our family since june, 2008.
content.summary: Red cigar-shaped with light floating above it.

content.detailedDescription: First off, nc, you are not crazy nor does it sound like you had sleep paralysis. the texas person sounds like they no nothing about what happens to someone when they are abducted or refuse to believe the unbelievable, therefore they deny. david m. jacobs, ph.D, author of "secret life,firsthand accounts of ufo abductions,published in 1992,simon & shuster, is an excellent book to read "texas". nc is having the same exact experiences that 300 other abductees in this book & have been having for at least 40 yrs. sound like a coincidence? i think not. hang in there nc & hopefully one day we will all find out the truth.
content.summary: In response to abducted in nc/ texas respondee

content.detailedDescription: I went to bed on nov. 30th 2008 @ 2:10. fell asleep and was woken by a bright light coming thru the window which woke me up but i couldn't move or speak, next thing i knew i was on a stretcher but ususally it is a hard table i'm that i am on. the short grey was there, which lets me know he wants to hurt me. then the tall grey appears and dismises the short one with a wave of his hand. he then rubs my forehead and lets me know i'm ok. they communicate with me telepathy. i am scanned by a machine that looks like a upside down l, usually that is all they do, but this time the short one came in and gave me an injection in my inner rt. upper arm!! it hurt really bad! then i was taken to what i call the waiting room to go home, still on a stretcher. then a bright redheaded woman come in and takes my hand in hers (but she only has four claws instead of a hand like we have) and says "come with me" i get up and go with her. i'm already scared to death because of the injection and the fact that i'd never see a woman there. this woman had bright red long hair, with what appeared to be a crown on her head. she was white skin with very beautiful dark deep deep blue slanted upward eyes.She has a small nose and a round mouth and actually talks like a human and her mouth moves! she is dressed in a shimmering silver gown with a dark purple hooded robe over it. she has on a dark deep blue diamond shaped stone that glows brillantly and bright. she had a very kind and trusting voice. i was amazed at this lady, i don't know if she was a queen or princess or what. i still partly afraid though cause i don't know what she wants with me. i saw no feet but her gown did drag the floor. she lead me to a room with children of all ages in it. from small to what i would consider to be teenagers. they all came running up to me as if they knew me and all looked like 2 people i know and myself. all of them!! they were trying to touch me and most did. then we went into another room which had embroys and fetuses. there were hundreds so it seemed, in containers with clear liquid around them. they had tubes and machines coming from them, they also had something over there eyes cause they were in bright lights. they looke human but had no visible sex organs. then she says "come on" and we leave. we walk down the hall to what appears to be a large picture window ina house. she tells me "to look thru it" & i did. what i saw i believe was the future. there was bloody wars in us and other countries just really graphic, and i was crying i don't want to see anymore and turned away. she yelled "look!" so i did, what i saw this time was death, how people were dying, some sickness some suicide others murdered. some i knew, some i've seen before and some i don't know. i finally told her i'd seen enough and refused to look back in the window. she keep saying "we're not through" over and over again. i kept saying "no, no"! then i was back in my bed and for awhile i couldnot move and speak, but as soon as i could i asked my husband where did the bright light go and where did the greys and that woman go. he said he didn't see anything as usual. i got up at 6am, tired and drained of energy. when i went to put my clothes on i noticed whelp marks on both sides of my abdomen, so my husband took pictures of them and a red area on my inner rt. arm. as the day went on the whelp on my abdomen got redder and looked like some kind of scratches! by night they were really red. pictures were taken of all areas that day and at night i had one appear on each upper arm, pictures were taken of them also. i had nightmares off and on that night and more pics. were taken on the 12-1-2008. i had nightmares that night also. i have never seen that woman before or shown anything or walked on that craft!! yes, i am scared to death but i know my life has to go on!! just pray they don't come back!!
content.summary: Abduction between 2;10am and 6:am have been going thru this all my life every year

content.detailedDescription: I was in downtown oakland at the art murmur on friday night. i was walking back to my car when caught a bright flicker in the corner of my vision coming from above. i happened to look up. i saw what appeared to be a glowing boomerang shaped object flying from the southeast to the northwest at 90 degrees to my location almost straight up. it was moving at a very high rate of speed, approximately twice as fast as a commercial airliner. there was no sound. i observed the object for about 1 to 2 seconds then it disappeared. at first i thought it was a plane and it could have been something military but because it disappeared, it was 'unidentifiable'.
content.summary: Fast moving luminescent boomerang shaped object flying overhead from se to nw then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was house-sitting for a friend near santa fe, and when returning to the house one evening, i spotted a very bright, slow moving white light with multiple non-blinking red and green lights below the white light. the object was moving in a southwesterly direction (heading approx. 240 degrees).

by the time i could get pulled over and get out my binoculars, the object was too far away to discern any particular shape. at first i thought it was a helicopter, but it was close enough that i would have heard it, and there was absolutely no sound. a helicopter passed to the north of this location at about twice the distance, and it could be heard quite clearly.

after watching the object for about twenty minutes, i proceeded on to the house, and continued periodically watching the object for the next two hours. from this particular location, there is a good view between the nearby hills to the southwest, and the object seemed to be following the same course for the duration of the sighting. from what i could tell, it also maintained the same altitude throughout the viewing period. the view was eventually blocked by distant mountains.

my reaction was, "wow - i'm a field inestigator, and i finally got to see one for myself!" (actually, it's not the first - just never one so close up).
content.summary: Very large, bright white light moving slowly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a japanese. the report of experience which contacted by ufo and telepathy sent this mail this time. while driving to the bon festival rest of a company in hakone in august, 1987, an alien is "ufo by telepathy -- it has been called -." when parking the car, opening the door and seeing the top, ufo was transparent and only its outline could be seen. it is transparent and the height of a size from a car is 8m in 8m for adamski. the alien by whom it is surrounded by the steel rod in the inside of ufo, who does not have sound and in whom chilly temperature and sound sound was husky voice. and it flew to the northeast. may, 1998 
washington seattle, the united states   & boeing tour has carried out. then, ufo was shouted. 
can it consult with this affair? i cannot speak english. it is writing using translation software. a japanese friend is in dc. 

thank you 

seiji morohoshi
content.summary: Close encounters of the third kind in japan.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in stephenville,texas... i still believe that about 90% of reported cases of ufo sightings are either wishful thinking, mistaken stars sightings, planes or weater baloon sightings... however... on this night, i heard someone outside talking about a star... so i went out to see what she was talking about.
i observed a bright light in the southern sky that appeared to be spinning or changing colors. flickering to brighter and then almost fade out entirely.
there was not a pattern to the colors. it would mostly be a white or bright light and would appear to flicker and change colors and shape.

i watched it for a long time, probably 45 minutes or so, but was too cold and went inside.
i came back 10 minutes later, and it was gone!
i have seen many flickering stars in my life... but this was not a star, planet, plane or weather baloon.

it is unidentifiably anything i've ever seen.

chalk this up as an unknown... but i will be more open minded from now on!

i will now watch for these things, and report back.
thanks,
starwatcher
content.summary: Bright light flashing colors near stephenville, texas.

content.detailedDescription:
Twilight in central illinois south of peoria.Was returning to work on a sunday evening when in slightly cloudy conditions i saw a formation of several bright lights which i thought wre the landing lights of an airplane since there was a nearby small private airfield. i began to notice that lights were hovering and not moving.After a few seconds they vanished.I said nothing about it for fear of ridicule but heard on radio 2 days later that it was reported by several thousand people over several states.Air force stated it was a russian satellite breaking up.Not sure of the year but knew it was prior to birth of my child in nov. 1984.Ive been curious over the years as to the exact date of the sighting and if anything further came of the sighting. in answer to your questions i was driving at about 50 miles per hour and casually glanced at the sky because my wife was flying a small airplane at that time but i found out later she was nowhere in the area.Unfortunately the sighting was like a scene in a speilberg movie.I remember being puzzled that i could not see the body of what i thought initially was my wife's plane due to what appeared to be whispy clouds that were part of the formation.I believe there were at least 4 lights in a v shaped formation.What made me begin to think that this was something unusual was the fact that i could see what appeared to be small black objects being ejected from the formation towards the ground almost as if something were being sown.The view was unobstructed since it was over a reaped farm field and there were no nearby trees or buildings.When the objects suddenly vanished i began to think that this might have been a ufo.I never discussed this with anyone since i have a somewhat off beat sense of humor and was well known for reading science fiction for entertainment.(and no i do not wear an aluminum foil hat to ward off radio transmissions from mars.I hold a doctorate and have had 10 years of advanced education beyond college).The first time i mentioned it in public years later in illinois the person i was doing business with sneared at me and left the office never to return.(a wealthy and rich attorney i might add)i was hoping that you might furnish me with the exact date so i might research the incident further since it was so widely reported.Thank you
p.S. the only reason i am reporting this is that i am now retired, living in a different state and no longer dependent on the public for my income.
content.summary: Several bright lights in v formation.

content.detailedDescription: My 14 yr old son and i were driving home from a hs football game in dallas.  we were south bound on i-35 between west and elmott when i noticed an odd light in the sky.  it was almost due south according to the compass in my truck.  it was about a hand width above the horizon.  it was a spot of light that was irregular in shape and to the naked eye appeared to be changing both shape and color.  it cycled through the pastel colors (light blue, light green, light yellow, light purple and light pink).  i brought it to my son's attention to see if he could see the same thing.  after watching it for a few miles he described it much as i did above.  as we were passing through elmott i estimated that it was directly above james conally airport.  at one point i thought it might be a sheriff's chopper with a spotlight. i figured we would be passing it on our left as we travelled further south.  we did not.  it was either moving away from us or it was stationary and much further away than i had estimated.  as we approached the north side of waco i decided we could get a better look if i hopped on loop 340 which circles waco to the west and south.  it also takes us out of the city lights.  as we rounded the loop headed toward robinson it became apparent that it was much further away than i had thought.  it was however still to the south but it did seem slightly lower to the horizon (about two fingers at arms length). all the while it continued to cycle randomly through the pastels and seemed to continuosly change shape to the naked eye. it never appeared to be round or symetrical in any way.  we turned off on fm3400 and followed it to the south until we reached downsville road approx 4-5 miles from the loop.  as it became apparent that we werent getting any closer i decided to pull over so we could get a better look.  standing still made no difference.  it still changed shape and color.  the sky was clear and full of stars and a half moon.  nothing else in the sky came close in appearance.  i would say it was 2 to 4 times brighter than the next brightest star.  we watched it for about 5 minutes.  it never really appeared to move.  it just twisted and turned and changed color.  from time to time i thought i could see faint light beams radiating out from it but i couldn't be sure.  we then decided to go home and get my small spotting scope out.  sure enough we still had a good view of it from our back yard.  again it appeared staionary from that vantage.  through the scope it looked somewhat different.  it appeared to have a solid shape but irregular like a rough tear drop shape on a 45 degree slant.  you could still see the color changes clearly but it was really tough to focus and hold it in frame.  i decided to take some pictures so i got my sony dsc-h1 and a tripod and took multiple pictures on multiple settings.  i also took a couple of short mpg's which show the color changes very well.  most of the pictures are fuzzy but there are a few that are very interesting.  they look stringy or like squiggles i assumed that was from the vibration from me pushing the shutter button.  i had recalled seeing a few stills on the news from the stephenville sightings earlier this year.  i pulled them up on my computer to show my son.  actually it was a video on you tube by david caron.  both my son and i agree that they are a perfect match.  anyway, we quit watching it and came inside because it was getting cold.  it was still in the same location doing its thing at about 2:30 a.M.  can you guys let me know if it is a known object?  i don't see anything on the star chart that should be there.
content.summary: Color and shape changing object in south sky (not moving).

content.detailedDescription: Northern jeffeson co.Proving grounds are off limit to all people. strange events with military happen there and there isnt supposed to be any military there. i had a friend that said he saw strange lights above the northern sector every night and i need to come check it out. he said it was wild. i went out there many nights. each night was different. the closest one came was maybe 500 feet. they made no sound. flashed different ways. it's almost as they were made of magnets electricity and water. they would sit and flash then zip across the sky and i seen a bunch of them form real quick and dissappear! i havn't been out there looking in a long time but i am sure something strange is going on there.
content.summary: There were many of them, different sizes. they join and dispurse. colorful flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription: It was summer 2006. my two sons (2 and 4 at the time) and i had just returned from shopping at wal mart. it was around 8:30-9:00pm, and it was warm because  i remember we all wore shorts. that's why i figure it was june/july. anyways, we live on an indian reservation in central cali,and there are not many lights (streetlights, etc). it's in the foothills of the sierra nevada range, so we have a nice big clear shot of the night sky. anyways, we pulled up next to the house and i got out to open the van door for my boys. soon as i opened the door and my 4 year old jumped out, i happened to catch movement in the corner of my eye. i looked up and i saw a huge triangle of lights moving silently from east to west over the oak tree behind our house. i'm not good at estimating size or distance, but i would say it was roughly the size of a large airplane, and it was flying about as low as the water helicopters do when they are fighting fires. it was low. there was a light at the tip, and i'm thinking 3 lights down each side. i seem to recall four lights making up each side of the triangle. the bottom had no lights. i couldn't make out any craft, other than the lights. i told me son, "hey look at that" and he says to me "it's a spaceship". lol the weird thing is, it moved without a sound. but, just about the time it got to the hills to the west (couple miles away?) all of a sudden you could hear the roaring sound of like a bunch of fighter jets, coming from over the mountain range, which is 12-14 miles from the house. i don't know if it was the "ufo's" engines or if there actually were jets following it. i went inside the house and put the local news on, and nothing. nothing on the radio either. i thought about calling in and asking if anyone else had seen it, but i just let it go. funny that no one else around the rez has mentioned it since. how could i have been the only one to see it?? well, me and my boys. i have a theory. i think it could be us military aircraft. i mean, the "flight path" would have been in line with china lake nafb and lemoore nafb. and, it's federal land.
content.summary: Large triangle with yellowish light at the tip, and 3-4 lights along the sides.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on galloway road in bensalem (toward hulmeville), passing the shopping center at the corner of galloway and hulmeville rds.  i noticed out my driver side window large red, white and blue lights flashing erratically, about 30 ft up in the air, in front of a bar in the shopping center.  i couldn't really see the object, as i was driving.  once i was able to stop, it was gone.
content.summary: I was driving and saw red, white and blue lights flashing (red and blue on top, white below) erratically about 30 ft up in the air.  by the time i was able to stop to look, it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: After settling down i can tell  your more about what we saw.  first of all is the size of the moon tonight,but a perfect round circle. it was giving off the same color as the moon, burning. it was completely  turquoise / green, and leaving a trailer at least tree times as long as the object itself. we was facing due south. if it hit the ground, it didnt make any noise.  plus something the size of the moon  hitting the earth would kill all of us. like i said earlier it was just like the one they was broadcasting on the new show in california. the only difference , this one was not on a plane... it was heading straight down towards the ground.  next we noticed at least 3 planes circuling the area.  look like they was trying to find the area where the object went/hit.  once again. it was the size of the moon in the sky falling to earth.
content.summary: Large moon size object.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving east on buttercup lane when my daughter saw two bright lights in the sky. we both looked up and we saw something that looked like a v. it had two bright lights at each end, and a center light that was green. it was coming toward us then it turned towards the southwest.  we tried to follow it to get a better look and as we turned it disappeared.
content.summary: V shaped.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from concord nh to claremont nh i looked up to see a bright star
much bigger than then others in front of me just above the mts. this happened
twice on the way home.The funny thing about it was when it drew my attention
the light would turn off. it gave me a creepy feeling.
content.summary: Bright star.

content.detailedDescription: While sitting in the back yard  around a camp fire, i observed a large white ball falling frome the sky.  it had the same  hue as the street light but it was surrounded a green flame. the flame was completely around the ball.  it left  a trail maybe 3 times as long as the ball itself.  i was facing due south when i saw the ball.  it fell in a dirrect path to the  ground.  im sure i can go to where i think it landed.  it looked identical to the video that they are showing... saying it is a meteor.  on thing for sure this one hit the ground because it was coming straight down.  at least 8 witnesses.  3 adults and 5 kids saw this thing. it scared the heck out of every one... we have been having frequent encounters.  mostly the starlike ufo. and the are dropping out of the sky and chasing/following/observing us very closely.  someone need to do something about these situations. please send us some help
content.summary: Large ball, white in center with turquoise flames around it.
